channel.title: programming on Do not limit yourself because you already “know”
channel.description: Recent content in programming on Do not limit yourself because you already “know”

item.title: Is go keyword always non-blocking?
item.description: When you look at your go code and see the go keyword, your first thought is like ok this is non-blocking because it’s prefixed with the go keyword. But sometimes this assumption may be wrong, let’s explore why.

item.title: Removing item(s) from a slice, while iterating in Go
item.description: How easy would it be to remove item(s) from a slice, while iterating that slice? It seems to be a trivial task, so lets see how to accomplish this in Go programming language.
